artefact: Find your local vehicle identity check site

artefact.description: Find a vehicle identity check (VIC) site to get a VIC marker removed from a written off vehicle.
artefact.introduction: You can find a vehicle identity check (VIC) site to get a vehicle’s VIC marker removed.

details.description: Includes selling your vehicle, personalised registration numbers and registering your vehicle

Book your driving test or get a tax disc online, find out the legal requirements for buying, owning, importing or scrapping a car or motorcycle, and read about your rights and responsibilities as a driver.

artefact.title: Apply for a Vehicle Identity Check (VIC) online

details.description: Use the VIC1 form to apply for a Vehicle Identity Check appointment
If your car has got a VIC marker it'll need to pass a VIC (Vehicle Identity Check) test before you can get a replacement registration certificate or renew its tax disc
